function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of planning and design for pandemics","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and difficulty in managing outbreaks","Mitigation":"Incorporate pandemic preparedness into urban planning and design","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for early detection and monitoring of outbreaks","People":"City planners, urban designers, and policy makers","Owner":"City governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Decreased public transportation ridership","Impact":"Reduced mobility and increased reliance on personal vehicles","Mitigation":"Implement measures to increase safety and confidence in public transportation","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, air filtration systems in transport vehicles","People":"Public transportation users, city residents","Owner":"Transportation authorities, city governments"},{"Description":"Lack of physical distancing in urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and difficulty in controlling outbreaks","Mitigation":"Promote and enforce physical distancing measures in urban spaces","Technologies":"Smart sensors for crowd monitoring and control","People":"Urban residents, visitors, and workers","Owner":"City governments, property owners, and businesses"}]}
